message: Let's split the money 60/40. I think this is a fair deal considering the inflation working against you more than me.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, considering the inflation will affect me more than you. Let's work together to get the best deal for both of us!
Bob, I see your point about the inflation difference. How about 58/42? It's closer to your offer, but still acknowledges the time pressure we both face.
